name: Cisco | IOS | Network | PIM | Neighbor Up (SYSLOG)
description: %PIM-5-NBRCHG: neighbor 10.10.20.21 UP on interface Vlan444 (vrf default)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | PIM | Neighbor Down (SYSLOG)
description: %PIM-5-NBRCHG: neighbor 10.110.0.60 DOWN on interface Vlan255 (vrf default) non DR

patterns.value_re: %PIM-5-NBRCHG: neighbor (?P<neighbor>\S+) DOWN on interface (?P<interface>\S+)( \(vrf (?P<vrf>\S+)\))?( non)? DR

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | PIM | DR Change #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %PIM-5-DRCHG: DR change from neighbor 10.0.32.42 to 10.0.32.34 on interface Tunnel1 (vrf VPN_Wayside)

patterns.value_re: %PIM-5-DRCHG: DR change from neighbor (?P<from_dr>\S+) to (?P<to_dr>\S+) on interface (?P<interface>\S+)( \(vrf (?P<vrf>\S+)\))?

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | PIM | DR Change #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %PIM-5-DRCHG: VRF blue: DR change from neighbor 0.0.0.0 to 172.16.1.1 on interface Tunnel0

patterns.value_re: %PIM-5-DRCHG: VRF (?P<vrf>\S+): DR change from neighbor (?P<from_dr>\S+) to (?P<to_dr>\S+) on interface (?P<interface>\S+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | PIM | Invalid RP #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %PIM-1-INVALID_RP_REG: Received Register from router 150.1.13.3 for group 225.1.1.1, 150.1.4.4 not willing to be RP

patterns.value_re: %PIM-1-INVALID_RP_REG: Received Register from router (?P<pim_router>\S+) for group .+, (?P<invalid_rp>\S+) not willing to be RP

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | PIM | Invalid RP #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %PIM-6-INVALID_RP_JOIN: Received (*, 225.1.1.6) Join from 150.1.45.5 for invalid RP 150.1.4.4

patterns.value_re: %PIM-6-INVALID_RP_JOIN: Received .+ Join from (?P<pim_router>\S+) for invalid RP (?P<invalid_rp>\S+)
